author: cmpilato
msg: Finish issue #2335:  Commits fail over ra-dav when locked paths with
MERGE requests.  Also, add DEBUG_CR's to the output for
(commit_xml_unsafe_file_unlock): New regression test for this defect.

author: kfogel
msg: Fix bug whereby 'svnlook propget --revprop -t TXN' didn't work.
(options_table): Mention that --revprop works with -t as well as -r.
(do_pget): Call get_property(), so we can get revprops from both
Thanks to David Weintraub <qazwart@gmail.com> for the report, at
Subject: Possible bug in "svn getprop --revprop" command

author: sussman
msg: Rewrite the property-merging algorithm shared by 'svn up' and 'svn merge'.
This fixes issue #2035: "property merging is seriously flawed".
For an explanation of the new algorithm, see notes/propmerging_sanity.txt.
(svn_wc_merge_props):        new public API, takes a hash of baseprops.
(svn_wc__merge_props):       new semi-public API for use by update-editor.
(simple_property_merges):    change the expected .prej text to match
property_merge_undo_redo):  new tests for issue #2035 bugs.
